message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects the true value of this item. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my asking price reflects the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a serious offer.
